boardgame.name: Car Wars
Car Wars Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description: Drive Offensively! Car Wars is a game featuring freeways of the future in which the right of way goes to those with the biggest guns. Players choose their vehicle _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; complete with weapons, armor, power plants, suspension, and even body style _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; then they take them out on the road, either to come home as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;aces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, or to crash and burn. If a driver survives, his abilities improve and he can earn money to buy bigger and better cars. Advanced rules let players design their own customized cars, trucks, and cycles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This entry covers Car Wars and Car Wars Deluxe, the first two editions of the rules. See also:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Car Wars Compendium, a.k.a. CWC and CWCII, for the third and fourth editions of the rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Car Wars (Fifth Edition) for the revised and simplified edition of the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mini Car Wars, an introductory version of Car Wars originally printed on a single sheet of paper, requiring only a pencil and six-sided dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Car Wars Series for a complete list of expansions and supplements (including Autoduel Quarterly, the forty-issue Car Wars magazine)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Car Wars Deluxe Edition, late 1980_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. Some counters sheets cut, and counters in ziplock bag. Maps, rule books, turning calculator, and game zine are all still there.
This is the small _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pocket_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; size edition. Note that I only accept PayPal to PayPal payments.

CAR WARS DELUXE EDITION 1990 Steve Jackson Games. Includes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;read this first_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; sheet, jump-start rules, 112 page car wars compendium 2nd edition 1st printing, ziplock baggie full of carefully cut counters, 4 road map sheets (2 double lane (two sided), 2 corners), 2 small turning keys aide, 3 extra large fold-out maps (7101.1 (midville), 7102.2 (midville), 7103.1 (truck stop)), scenarios booklet, 4 page weapon data charts, Two 4 page motors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; accessories _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; vehicle design data charts, order form, summer 1991 catalog. + Bonus items of Car Wars Vehicle Design Sheets Book 1989 #7146 + Autoduel Quarterly vol 8 no. 3 (which includes full length adventure _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Aerowarriors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. All of the items are in very good or better condition, the counters are neatly cut out and in the large baggie provided. The box is worn with marks along with an indented top cover. Shipping weight is 4 pounds.
Played once. Deluxe boxed set w/ some extras.

Good condition copy Â£10 All contents in reasonable condition, with only minimal wear Also for anyone interested I have a large number of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;AutoDuel quarterly_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; magazines and car wars add ons

i have a rather large box full of old Car Wars games. Just know that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re getting your money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s worth and then some! Buy now, and i ship the next business day! Will happily combine shipping with multiple orders. SPECIAL! Take 5% off the total price for EACH game you buy from me after the first one!! Maximum 30% off. Save on Shipping, and get an incredible deal!

Pocket Box edition.

The original pocket edition. Includes the basic game Car Wars, the two supplements Sunday Drivers and Truck Stop, the expansion sets 1, 2, 3 (East Midville) and 4 (Armadillo Autoduel Arena) and the magazine The Best of Autoduel Quarterly Vol. 1. As a bonus, there are the free game Mini Car Wars and Car Wars: the card game.
Edition in plastic case. Is meant to have TRUCKSTOP and SUNDAY DRIVERS with it (will confirm)

This is a shrinkwrapped copy of Car Wars Classic. Box is a bit crushed but intact. Includes 103 counters, turning key, 64 page rulebook, extra tables, record sheets, and map of arena and raceway, along with ziplock bag for storage.

This is the Car Wars Deluxe Edition, a black box. It contains: Car Wars Compendium, 2nd edition; Car Wars Map Sheet B; Car Wars Map Sheet (Blank); 2 cut turning guides; 8 cut out cars; Map 1301.09 Crash City, South; Map 1301.08 Crash City, North; Map 1301.07 Truck Stop; Car Wars Jump Start Rules; Car Wars Tanks Map Sheet A; 20 Car Record Sheets; 2 cut straight aways; ADQ Vol. 10, No. 2; 4 Vehicle Construction Sheets; Car Wars Tanks rulebook; 6 mostly uncut sheets including more road, semis, motorcycles, cars, helicopters, pedestrians, turning keys, paint, smoke, oil, caltrops, mines, rubble, tanks, and antitank guns. The box has some scuffing and one split corner. Nonsmoking home.
Deluxe boxed edition. Counters have been cut (carefully), but the game is complete and in very good condition.

Car Wars Deluxe box set. Published in 1985. Box has some shelf wear, slight dishing and one split corner. Contents are complete, pristine and uncut. This game has never been played. It also includes many extras. - Car Wars: Expansion #6 (1984) - AADA Vehicle Guide Counters (Complete and uncut) - Car Wars: Expansion #7 (1985) - Off-Road Dueling (Complete and uncut) - The AADA Vehicle Guide (1984) (Slight edge wear on book) - Car Wars Compendium (1989) - Complete Rules in one volume (Slight edge wear and one bent corner) - Map of unknown origin - Has Ashland Duel Emporium on one side and Dr. Cobalt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Secret Lab on the other. - Small magazine cutout of a scenario. Harshman Memorial Stadium.

Car Wars is a game featuring freeways of the future in which the right of way goes to those with the biggest guns. Players choose their vehicle â€” complete with weapons, armor, power plants, suspension, and even body style â€” then they take them out on the road, either to come home as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;aces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, or to crash and burn. Steve Jackson Games (SJG1400) Car Wars is the game of the freeways of the future, where the right of way goes to the biggest guns. Players build vehicles complete with weapons, armor, power plants, and more. Then they take them out on the desolate roads, or maybe the brightly lit arenas, to come home as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;aces,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; or to crash and burn. The winners earn fame and cash to upgrade their rides. The losers are left in the dust.
